page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.

page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [GRA][Web Hosting/Webmail] - Webmail/Multiple filerz incident notification
incidents.message: We had an incident on Web Hosting and Webmail which has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 26/08/2025 02:25 UTC End time : 26/08/2025 02:49 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Webmail and Web Hosting storage were unreachable. Customers Impact : Customers experienced difficulties accessing their email accounts, both through webmail and desktop email clients. They were unable to send or receive emails during this time. However, please be assured that all emails received during this period were stored and are being delivered as the issue is fully resolved. Additionally, customers' websites hosted in the GRA region were temporarily unavailable across all clusters. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment configuration malfunction. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [GRA1][Web Hosting] - Multiple clusters incident notification
incidents.message: We had an incident on Web Hosting offer which has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 04/08/2025 15:26 UTC End time : 04/08/2025 15:34 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Degradation of services on server1813 cluster031, server1590 cluster031, server1584 cluster028, server1574 cluster030, server1543 cluster030, server1602 cluster029, server1606 cluster031, server862 cluster003 and server47 cluster020 Customers Impact : You may have experienced services degradation on the specified clusters. Root Cause : This incident was caused by operations on this maintenance: https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/3g1qjh0fr3kx We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [Global][Webmail] - Webmail incident notification
incidents.message: We had an incident on Collaborative solutions which has now been resolved. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 04/08/2025 15:26 UTC End time : 04/08/2025 15:34 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Impossible to log in email addresses, whether via webmail or a heavy mail client and send or receive emails. Customers Impact : Customers were unable to access their email accounts, either via webmail or a heavy mail client, to send or receive emails. We would like to assure you that all emails received during the period of the incident will be stored securely and delivered progressively as the issue has been resolved. Root Cause : This incident was caused by operations on this maintenance: https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/3g1qjh0fr3kx We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Web Hosting] - Statistics incident notification
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting offering has been resolved. Start time : 31/07/2025 14:00 UTC End time : 01/08/2025 13:40 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Web Hosting statistics weren't displayed in the manager. Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to see their web hosting statistics in GRA. Since 01/08/2025 13:40 UTC, Web Hosting statistics are displayed via the manager. However, statistics between 31/07/2025 14:00 UTC and 01/08/2025 13:40 UTC are not displayed via the manager but you can find them via the link: https://logs.YOURCLUSTERNAME.hosting.ovh.net/ by replacing "YOURCLUSTERNAME" with the name of your cluster. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
